summary: SummaryA great lip liner does more than just outline, it defines, enhances, and elevates your entire lip look. Whether you're going for a soft, natural pout or a bold, statement lip, the Juvia's Place Longwear Lip Liner is the key to effortless perfection.
details: DetailsFeaturesWhether you're creating the perfect base for your lipstick or wearing it solo for a soft matte finish, this liner stays flawless - no fading.Define & Shape - Create precise, sculpted lips with sharp or softly rounded edges.Even Out Your Lips - Fill in uneven areas to achieve a smooth, flawless base.Make Your Lipstick Last - 13 Hours of wear, Layering lip liner under lipstick locks in color for all-day wear.Prevent Feathering & Smudging - Keep your lip color crisp with a liner that acts as a barrier. Plus It's Kiss Proof.Plump & Enhance - Overline for a fuller, poutier look - no fillers needed.Item 2636843How To UseKeep it sharpened with a precise tip to ensure smooth, clean lines and effortless application.Apply brighter shades in the center as a base to add emphasis to matching lipstick shades from any of Juvia's Place lipstick lines.Use non-glossy lip balms to keep the formula true to form and create a soft, minimal finish.Mix different lip liners for combos to create custom shades and unique looks.
how_to_use: Keep it sharpened with a precise tip to ensure smooth, clean lines and effortless application.Apply brighter shades in the center as a base to add emphasis to matching lipstick shades from any of Juvia's Place lipstick lines.Use non-glossy lip balms to keep the formula true to form and create a soft, minimal finish.Mix different lip liners for combos to create custom shades and unique looks.

reviews.headline: Point immediately broke.
reviews.comments: I bought 4 pencils and the point on all 4 broke as soon as it touched my lip. I 've been doing makeup over 35 years and know how much pressure to apply. These pencils are horrible and I won't buy them again.

reviews.headline: Not worth kt
reviews.comments: The quality is really good but too smooth and sharpening don't help. I love the luxe liner

reviews.headline: New Staple
reviews.comments: My new forever liner. It is absolutely longwearing. The only con is it is hard to sharpen and you will have to do that frequently; one use and you need to sharpen again because it is so creamy.

reviews.headline: Love this liner
reviews.comments: I love this liner ! It's very smooth and last a while! I paired it with the NYX butter gloss.. CHEFS KISS!

reviews.headline: Smooth crayon
reviews.comments: I definitely love the smoothness on this crayon. Not sure if it's longwear as stated maybe a few hours for me, but definitely pigmented enough.

reviews.headline: Blueprint 2 Lip Liner!!!
reviews.comments: This lipliner is FAB! I have the color mocktailâ€¦ and yes it's a FAB color on my deep dark skin tone (shade ref: Mac NC 63). Last a long time and performs while eating, drinking, whistling and against a napkin! Highly recommend this and will purchase other shades.

reviews.headline: Added to the roster
reviews.comments: I am a dark skinned 30 something year-old and I love brown liners. I have them all. I used to use the pink and loved coffee bean, but it did not last. I was really excited to see that. There was a long way of formula and coffee being existed as well. It did not disappoint. I'm a teacher and I talk all day and drink liquid all day and this really lasted. I used it with a Mac lipstick and Fenty lip gloss. I even ate some food and my lipstick wiped off, but my liner was still on!

reviews.headline: It really is long lasting...
reviews.comments: I am absolutely in love with these pencils. I bought it in the color "mocktail" after seeing a video about it on social media. I've tried other "long-lasting" pencils before, but this one legitimately lasts. I applied it at 9am and it lasted all day (past 5PM) without needing to reapply. Definitely worth the investment.

reviews.headline: this lip liner is super creamy
reviews.comments: this lip liner is super creamy, which i initially loved at first. but the formula makes it hard sharpen & it breaks easily. i would not recommend

reviews.headline: looove the color 'kola'
reviews.comments: i love that its smudge proof compared to mac lip liners, yet im not a fan of the browns. I love kola tho, to me its like a good blend of chestnut and root for me from mac. its a beautiful natural brown

reviews.headline: So good ya can't even use it
reviews.comments: The product is so soft that you can't even sharpen it and then it just smooshes. It's a mess. I brought it up to this beauty influencer that was trying to push it to the public, and they chalked it up to user error and saying that I wasn't using a clean sharpener, as if they were in my beauty room with me lol but alas, that is not the case it is a formulation issue. I love creamy, but I love being usable simultaneously.

reviews.headline: Breaks easy
reviews.comments: The liner itself is nice but the tip broke off so easy and the product is so soft it won't sharpen. I can't use it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this color again
reviews.comments: The product glides on smoothly on my lips but its missing a star because it seems like it fades. It's a beautiful product and I have received many compliments

reviews.headline: impressively longwearing
reviews.comments: I was ISO of some good brown liners with the undertones I wanted, which were perfect. I bought the shades "coffee bean" and "kola" - 'kola' has a warm, plummy undertone while 'coffee bean' is slightly more neutral/cool. I'm so glad they are pencils, making sharpening so much easier. They are creamy and don't feel dry. In terms of wear, they are VERY long wearing, even after eating and drinking, but they aren't necessarily transfer-proof, but that could be because I wear them with gloss. I wore them once without powdering my lips and once with powdering them, and the base formula + powdering the lip liners = insane longevity; it actually took a bit of elbow grease to remove. Overall, if you want a long-wearing lip liner that lasts hours, even after eating or drinking, I think these are a safe bet.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Loveeeeeeeee. Just like the MUFE ones but better colors.

reviews.headline: Absolutely amazing
reviews.comments: I just bought this lip liner the other day and immediately its a yes. If you have tried the fenty lip liners they are like that but I feel as tho this last longer. I put it on at 10am and it hadn't even started to smudge by the time I got home at 11 at night after going out to eat and everything and it was still perfect.

media.headline: I would buy this color again
media.caption: Shining with juvia

faceoff_positive.comments: I was ISO of some good brown liners with the undertones I wanted, which were perfect. I bought the shades "coffee bean" and "kola" - 'kola' has a warm, plummy undertone while 'coffee bean' is slightly more neutral/cool. I'm so glad they are pencils, making sharpening so much easier. They are creamy and don't feel dry. In terms of wear, they are VERY long wearing, even after eating and drinking, but they aren't necessarily transfer-proof, but that could be because I wear them with gloss. I wore them once without powdering my lips and once with powdering them, and the base formula + powdering the lip liners = insane longevity; it actually took a bit of elbow grease to remove. Overall, if you want a long-wearing lip liner that lasts hours, even after eating or drinking, I think these are a safe bet.
